results.content:
What was covered was excellent. There are several other shortcodes I feel could have been covered too and I think given the creator has add ons and that the tutor has these on his systems it would have been useful to cover these. The course does say Advanced Expert. Well we won't be if much of the software isn't covered.
This said I still enjoyed what was presented and hope other videos can be added to cover more of the shortcodes especially the add ons. One using the shortcode creator (an add on) using both HTML and PHP would really enhance the course.

response.content: Hey, Thanks, Tony. I appreciate your nice rating and will review the uncovered shortcodes that are more advanced which can use more video lectures from my end.
response.content_html: Hey, Thanks, Tony. I appreciate your nice rating and will review the uncovered shortcodes that are more advanced which can use more video lectures from my end.

results.content: i had just expected more customization tips and out of the box things. this is just mostly how to use the plugin as it is built. i was really hoping to learn how to run a post list across more than one column, but the column lesson was really basic.
